#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

Digicities is a GCash program that works with local government units in 27 major cities to make digital payments more accessible.

Digicities aims to:

1. **Help Local Governments:** Provide easy-to-use digital tools to make government services more efficient.
2. **Support Businesses:** Make it easier for businesses to accept payments and reach more customers.
3. **Teach Digital Skills:** Help people learn the skills they need to succeed in a digital world

For further information, visit the [official Digicities website](https://new.gcash.com/business/public-sector/digicities).
